content: I just set-up gPodder, which is a nice and simple desktop podcast manager. Here's my current listening habits: Hype Machine Radio Show (music) KEXP Presents Music That Matters (music) Mark Kermode and Simon Mayo's Film Reviews (film) NPR: All Songs Considered Podcast (music) NPR: Tiny Desk Concerts Podcast (music) This Week In Google (tech) this WEEK in TECH - MP3 Edition (tech)
title: Podcasts
author: Michael Flanagan
